Class ApiController

java.lang.Object
com.Meter.IskraemcoInterns.ApiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.context.Lifecycle, org.springframework.context.Phased, org.springframework.context.SmartLifecycle
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/meter") @Service public class ApiController extends Object implements org.springframework.context.SmartLifecycle
REST controller that exposes Iskra DLMS smart-meter functionality over HTTP. Supported operations:
  • Read active energy (kWh)
  • Read meter RTC
  • Open / close the internal relay
  • Query relay state
  • Gracefully disconnect / reconnect the serial port
The controller implements SmartLifecycle so the serial port is automatically closed when the Spring application shuts down. All endpoints are mapped under /api/meter/**.

    • readEnergy

      @GetMapping("/energy") public String readEnergy() throws Exception
      GET /api/meter/energy
      Returns:
      cumulative active energy in kWh as plain text
      Throws:
      Exception - on communication or parsing error

    • readClock

      @GetMapping("/clock") public String readClock() throws Exception
      GET /api/meter/clock
      Returns:
      meter RTC as plain text (format depends on meter firmware)
      Throws:
      Exception - on communication or parsing error

    • disconnectRelay

      @GetMapping("/disconnect") public String disconnectRelay() throws Exception
      GET /api/meter/disconnect Opens the internal relay (cuts power to the load).
      Returns:
      confirmation message
      Throws:
      Exception - on communication or relay failure

    • connectRelay

      @GetMapping("/connect") public String connectRelay() throws Exception
      GET /api/meter/connect Closes the internal relay (restores power to the load).
      Returns:
      confirmation message
      Throws:
      Exception - on communication or relay failure

    • relayStatus

      @GetMapping("/status") public String relayStatus() throws Exception
      GET /api/meter/status
      Returns:
      current relay state, typically OPEN or CLOSED
      Throws:
      Exception - on communication error

    • closeConnection

      @GetMapping("/mediaDisconnect") public String closeConnection() throws Exception
      disconnects the media (serial port and connection and so)
      Returns:
      a string that the disconnection is successful
      Throws:
      Exception - the meter doesn't respond, IO error, and such

    • openConnection

      @GetMapping("/mediaConnect") public String openConnection() throws Exception
      connects the media again (serial port and connection with a handshake and so)
      Returns:
      the connection is successful
      Throws:
      Exception - the meter doesn't respond, IO error, and such

    • close

      @PreDestroy public void close()
      Invoked by Spring on JVM shutdown. Ensures the serial port is released even if stop() was not called.
